name: 3 Image References
systemPrompt:
Using the following reference images:
1. Reference 1: {img_1} — use this as the subject image.
2. Reference 2: {img_2} — use this as the background reference.
3. Reference 3: {img_3} — use this as the style reference.

Combine these references according to the instructions below:
userPrompt:
----subject------
A charismatic male motivational speaker on stage.
He is smiling warmly and gesturing with his hands pressed together, while making a point. 
A lapel microphone is clipped to his jacket. 
He look out at an audience.

--background---
The background is filled with a huge led screen,  under dramatic stage lighting, giving a vibrant, high-energy atmosphere. 
On screen is a close up of F22 fighter jet in flight making a turn.
The image is blurred, high contrast image, some led pixelation is slightly noticable in the screen.
----styling----
The mood should feel inspiring, confident, and professional—like a promotional image from a large live seminar.
--------
Shot from about eight meters away and zoomed in tightly from shoulders to above the head.

The focus is sharp on the speaker, with shallow depth of field keeping the background abstract and out of focus. 

The speaker fills 1/3 of the frame, shot from a low 3/4 angle.

The left side of the image is relativly free from visual clutter.
--
Output image's size : 2048X1200
